alfredsnippet.snippet:
df1 = (df['c0']
       .dropna()
       .apply(lambda x : "4+" if x>4 else str(int(x)))
       .value_counts())

df1.plot(kind='pie',
         y='values',
         title='',
         figsize=(8,8),
         autopct="%1.0f%%",
         shadow=False,
         startangle=115,
         rotatelabels=True,
         explode=(0, 0, 0, 0.1, 0),
         colors=sns.color_palette("husl",len(df1)),
         wedgeprops={"linewidth":2,"edgecolor":"white"});
alfredsnippet.name: plot pie pandas2
